createbillestimate.name: CreateBillEstimate
createbillestimate.description: Grants permission to create a new bill estimate. Charge is incurred for successful bill estimates

createbillscenario.name: CreateBillScenario
createbillscenario.description: Grants permission to create a new bill scenario

createbillscenariocommitmentmodification.name: CreateBillScenarioCommitmentModification
createbillscenariocommitmentmodification.description: Grants permission to create new commitments or remove existing commitment from a specified bill scenario

createbillscenariousagemodification.name: CreateBillScenarioUsageModification
createbillscenariousagemodification.description: Grants permission to create usage in the specified bill scenario

createworkloadestimate.name: CreateWorkloadEstimate
createworkloadestimate.description: Grants permission to create a new Workload estimate

createworkloadestimateusage.name: CreateWorkloadEstimateUsage
createworkloadestimateusage.description: Grants permission to create usage in the specified workload estimate

deletebillestimate.name: DeleteBillEstimate
deletebillestimate.description: Grants permission to delete bill estimate

deletebillscenario.name: DeleteBillScenario
deletebillscenario.description: Grants permission to delete a bill scenario

deletebillscenariocommitmentmodification.name: DeleteBillScenarioCommitmentModification
deletebillscenariocommitmentmodification.description: Grants permission to delete newly added commitments from the specified bill scenario

deletebillscenariousagemodification.name: DeleteBillScenarioUsageModification
deletebillscenariousagemodification.description: Grants permission to delete newly added usage from the specified bill scenario

deleteworkloadestimate.name: DeleteWorkloadEstimate
deleteworkloadestimate.description: Grants permission to delete the specified workload estimate

deleteworkloadestimateusage.name: DeleteWorkloadEstimateUsage
deleteworkloadestimateusage.description: Grants permission to delete newly added usage from the specified workload estimate

getbillestimate.name: GetBillEstimate
getbillestimate.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a bill estimate including estimated cost

getbillscenario.name: GetBillScenario
getbillscenario.description: Grants permission to retrieve information associated with a bill scenario

getpreferences.name: GetPreferences
getpreferences.description: Grants permission to retrieve applicable rate type preferences for the account

getworkloadestimate.name: GetWorkloadEstimate
getworkloadestimate.description: Grants permission to retrieve information associated with a workload estimate

listbillestimatecommitments.name: ListBillEstimateCommitments
listbillestimatecommitments.description: Grants permission to list commitments associated with the specified bill estimate

listbillestimateinputcommitmentmodificat.name: ListBillEstimateInputCommitmentModifications
listbillestimateinputcommitmentmodificat.description: Grants permission to list added or removed commitments for a specified bill estimate

listbillestimateinputusagemodifications.name: ListBillEstimateInputUsageModifications
listbillestimateinputusagemodifications.description: Grants permission to list added or modified usage for a specified bill estimate

listbillestimatelineitems.name: ListBillEstimateLineItems
listbillestimatelineitems.description: Grants permission to list result line items for a specified bill estimate

listbillestimates.name: ListBillEstimates
listbillestimates.description: Grants permission to list bill estimates

listbillscenariocommitmentmodifications.name: ListBillScenarioCommitmentModifications
listbillscenariocommitmentmodifications.description: Grants permission to list commitments included in a bill scenario

listbillscenariousagemodifications.name: ListBillScenarioUsageModifications
listbillscenariousagemodifications.description: Grants permission to list usage lines of a specified bill scenario

listbillscenarios.name: ListBillScenarios
listbillscenarios.description: Grants permission to list bill scenarios

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags for a resource

listworkloadestimateusage.name: ListWorkloadEstimateUsage
listworkloadestimateusage.description: Grants permission to list usage lines for the specified workload estimate

listworkloadestimates.name: ListWorkloadEstimates
listworkloadestimates.description: Grants permission to list workload estimates

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add a tag to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a resource

updatebillestimate.name: UpdateBillEstimate
updatebillestimate.description: Grants permission to update bill estimate name and expiration date time

updatebillscenario.name: UpdateBillScenario
updatebillscenario.description: Grants permission to update name and expiration date time of the specified bill scenario

updatebillscenariocommitmentmodification.name: UpdateBillScenarioCommitmentModification
updatebillscenariocommitmentmodification.description: Grants permission to update commitment group of commitments in the specified bill scenario

updatebillscenariousagemodification.name: UpdateBillScenarioUsageModification
updatebillscenariousagemodification.description: Grants permission to update usage amount, usage hour, and usage group in the specified bill scenario

updatepreferences.name: UpdatePreferences
updatepreferences.description: Grants permission to update rate type preferences for the account

updateworkloadestimate.name: UpdateWorkloadEstimate
updateworkloadestimate.description: Grants permission to update name and expiration date time of the specified workload estimate

updateworkloadestimateusage.name: UpdateWorkloadEstimateUsage
updateworkloadestimateusage.description: Grants permission to update usage amount and usage group in the specified workload estimate based on the usage id
